snippet.title: Love Me or Die 📲 | Playing the Demo with the devs! (Spanish)
snippet.description:
#graphicadventure #indiegame #videogames #pixelart

¡Lanzamiento en Steam el 21 de octubre, 2024! Añádelo a Wishlist ahora y llévatelo con 10% de descuento exclusivo de lanzamiento.
Love Me or Die. Yuki, una adolescente incomprendida, emprende una búsqueda desesperada de popularidad y fama… que la llevará a un oscuro y trágico viaje. Una aventura gráfica retro con puzzles desafiantes, combates de tweets intensos y un mundo pixelado lleno de humor y misterios.

######🇬🇧######

Launching on Steam on October 21st, 2024! Wishlist it now and get it with a 10% Exclusive Launch Discount!

Yuki, a lonely teenager, embarks on a desperate quest for popularity and fame. But her path soon turns into a dark and tragic journey that will change her life forever. A retro graphic adventure with challenging puzzles, intense tweet battles, and a pixelated world filled with humor and mysteries. 

Follow us on socials:
🔹 Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3165520/Love_Me_or_Die/
🔹 Website: https://chaoticravens.com
🔹 Twitter: https://x.com/ChaoticRavensST
🔹 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chaoticravensst/
🔹 LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/chaotic-ravens-studio/?viewAsMember=true
